title: Scott Van Pelt to anchor 'SportsCenter' from Xfinity Center after Terps-Georgetown
text:
Published By: Baltimore Sun: Terps - Today 
After sitting courtside for most big Maryland basketball games in the past 15 years to root for his alma mater, ESPN anchor Scott Van Pelt p...
